name: Track World GT
description:
Game features:
- race against the clock (3 medals to achieve in each track)
- low poly graphic
- 2 themes: speedway and coast
- 5 cars with different driving style
- 75 basic tracks (including endurance)
- arcade but challenging driving physics
- easy to play, hard to master
- level editor
- 3 steering options (gamepad support) and 2 camera to choose
- car customization
- addictive gameplay

Music by Rezoner:
https://soundcloud.com/rezoner
